txt.en: 'A moment to rest, please. I'm sorry to trouble you like this.'
'Let us begone from this hellish place.'
'My thanks to you. I should be safe now. Please let me return to the camp on my own - I don't want the others to know I needed help.'
'Curse these wounds! The beasts can smell blood, and come for me.'
'We've been lucky thus far, but I think I hear more up ahead. Be on your guard!'
